Html:
Hi,

 

I working on a symfony project in window 7 developement env and deploy the code to unix env .

Due to project constraint, i am require to use EXCEL5 writer.

My script open an excel template and add it into a new PhpExcel Object with loaded data. I then save it and send back to user using http.

This script run smoothly in window env but once i deploy to unix env, i always get a "unreadable content" error when i open the excel file generated.

The data remains but all the formating gone.

 

I then include codes

    error_reporting(E_ALL);
    ini_set('display_errors', '1');

into both env and i get the following notice only in unix env.

Notice: Undefined property: PHPExcel_Shared_OLE_PPS_File::$_PPS_FILE in /home/xxx/public_html/yyy/plugins/sfPhpExcelPlugin/lib/PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Shared/OLE/OLE_File.php on line 107
 

Is the above error causes the error? Thanks for your help.

 

Ps: I am using 56196 change set of PHPExcel & PHP 5.3+.

 

Best regards,

Steven

I can't find the problem source but it works when i changed to previous ChangeSet.

Thanks anyway.
